result.execSummary:
The defendant Joriana N Kelly was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joriana N Kelly is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joriana N Kelly was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joriana N Kelly

defendant.name: Kelly, Joriana N
defendant.address: 152 1/2 N Main, Apt 1, Richland Center, WI 53581

records.addlTxt: Application and Order for Specific Judicial Assignment

03:30 PM Defendant Joriana N Kelly appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. JK has received the complaint and waives the formal reading. Max penalties stated. Court speaks about counsel. Court advies JK to speak with Attorney Forehand. Attorney Forehand states that she would be willing to amend this to an ordinance violation with $25 plus cost. JK accpets the offer. Court amends to 79.4. JK enters a guilty plea. Court orders $25 plus costs. Court dismisses count 2.
Adjourned initial appearance on March 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

10:30 AM Defendant Joriana N Kelly appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. JK hasn't received the criminal complaint. JK updates the court with her new address.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Joriana N Kelly
Current: 152 1/2 N Main, Apt 1, Richland Center, WI 53581   (Effective: 02-28-2022)
Prior: 255 E. Mill St. Apt. 3, Richland Center, WI 53581
Initial appearance on February 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Funds were taken by dispatch in cash due to technical issues. No "Notice of Posting Cash Bond" was done. Clerk receipted funds in on 01/21/22.

Defendant shall have  no contact directly or indirectly with DL or that person's residence and is not to go to (address stated on bond).

Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcohol and shall submit to evidentiary testing of blood, breath or urine, on demand of law enforcement, to monitor compliance. No entry into bars, taverns, or any establishment of which the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol, Phoenix Center included.
